formatDescription: TRS is the native, XML-based format of Transcriber, a tool for assisting the manual annotation of speech signals. Transcriber (https://trans.sourceforge.net/) was superseded by Transcriber AG (https://transag.sourceforge.net/)

internalSignatures.name: Transcriber TRS Format
internalSignatures.note: BOF offset 0, XML 1.0 declaration, then !DOCTYPE declaration ‘trans’. A DTD for version 1.4 of the file format can be found here: https://github.com/giuliopaci/transcriber/blob/master/etc/trans-14.dtd. For now, PRONOM does not distinguish between different versions of TRS.
